title: OpenAI GPT-5 Just Leaked: Release Date, Insane New Features & Why It's Terrifying Experts
shortdescription: Sam Altman accidentally confirmed GPT-5 drops before end of 2025 – full reasoning engine included.
author: Tech Expert

content.content: The Leak That Broke the Internet
Sam Altman just slipped up in a private investor call — GPT-5 is coming before December 31, 2025, and internal benchmarks show it completely obliterates every existing model.

• Full o3-level reasoning engine built-in (no more separate “reasoning mode”)
• Native 4K video generation + audio understanding
• 100x larger context window (rumored 1M+ tokens)
• Solves complex multi-step problems autonomously
• Scores 95%+ on coding, math, and science benchmarks
Experts are calling it “the first true AGI preview” — and some are genuinely terrified of its capabilities.
